resources.string: Tesserekt is something like "Uno Tic-Tac-Toe" on a slightly larger board.
Start the game by tapping any tile on the outer ring of the game board to claim it.
Players alternate turns claiming a tile for their own. Only tiles that match either the color or the numeral of the tile claimed during the previous turn are eligible to be claimed.
A player wins by claiming all the tiles in a row, column, diagonal, or 2x2 square of tiles. A player may also win by claiming a tile which cannot legally be followed.
A draw game is possible is all 16 tiles have been claimed, but no single row, column, diagonal, or 2x2 square has been claimed wholly by any player.
